p:
When comparing the free amino acids content in the fermented PK to that in the control PK, a remarkable increment in concentration was found in almost all individual amino acids after Y. lipolytica fermentation; the total free amino acid concentration has increased by 7-fold. This increment in amino acids highlights the strong proteolytic capability of Y. lipolytica, which produces both extracellular acid and alkaline proteases
32 . Releasing free amino acids by Y. lipolytica was also found in okara and cheese fermentation, and this is essential for cheese ripening
22, 33 .
